body_html:
I am able to reproduce the error with docker/ci script though I am still not able to reproduce with standalone command line:

bazel test -s --config=opt --verbose_failures //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:conv1d_test

One difference between docker/CI script and the above standalone command line seems to be --distinct_host_configuration=false.

Will need to investigate further to see what is exactly the difference.
body_text:
I am able to reproduce the error with docker/ci script though I am still not able to reproduce with standalone command line:
bazel test -s --config=opt --verbose_failures //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:conv1d_test

body:
I am able to reproduce the error with docker/ci script though I am still not able to reproduce with standalone command line:
```
bazel test -s --config=opt --verbose_failures //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:conv1d_test
```

One difference between docker/CI script and the above standalone command line seems to be `--distinct_host_configuration=false`.

Will need to investigate further to see what is exactly the difference.
